title: Demonologist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose two players to Ritualize.
- Ritualized is a status that lasts until death.
- When a Ritualized player dies, they become your Demon.
- At night, if you have at least one Demon, you may choose a player to Stalk. The effects of Stalking change depending on what your Demons vote for.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may speak with your Demons at night.
- While Stalking, all your Demons are prompted to vote what you do:
- Deal a basic attack to a player
- Heal the player
- Roleblock the player (and you gain RB immunity tonight)
- Investigate the player to see if they're suspicious or innocent
- If the decision ties, it is chosen randomly.
